Title: Red, White, and Blueberry Lemonade
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/red-white-and-blueberry-lemonade-recipe-11753759
Ingredients:
- 1cup (packed)fresh strawberry halves
- 1/2cup(packed)fresh blueberries
- 1 1/4cupswhite sugar, divided
- 6lemons, organic preferred,or more as needed (you may need as many as 10 lemons)
- 5cupswater
Instructions:
1. Combine strawberries, blueberries, and 1/2 of the sugar in a bowl. Use a potato masher to lightly crush berries until all blueberries have broken open.
2. Use a sharp vegetable peeler to peel off just the yellow zest from 6 lemons; add lemon zest to the berry-sugar mixture.
3. Pour remaining sugar into the bowl and mix thoroughly. Cover and let sit on the counter for 2 to 6 hours, stirring occasionally, or refrigerate overnight if you prefer.
4. Bring 5 cups water to boil in a saucepan, transfer in berry mixture. Immediately turn off heat, and let sit for 5 minutes, stirring a few times.
5. Set a fine mesh strainer over a heatproof bowl, and pour berry mixture through the strainer; press out liquid gently. Let cool to room temperature, about 20 minutes.
6. Cut the 6 zested lemons in half, and squeeze the juice (through a strainer to catch the seeds) into the bowl.
7. Taste, and juice in more lemons as desired. You will have another chance to adjust the final flavor after the lemonade is cold.
8. Transfer lemonade into a pitcher and refrigerate until fully chilled, about 1 hour. Give the lemonade a final taste, and adjust with more fresh lemon juice or sugar if necessary. Fill glasses with ice to serve.John MitzewichChef's NoteI recommended using organic lemons. They are not sprayed with chemicals or waxed. If using conventional lemons, wash thoroughly under hot water to remove any wax from the surface. I also recommendedo using regular lemons, not Meyer lemons, which are less acidic, and too sweet for this recipe.You can find the recipe for the originalState Fair Lemonadehere.

========================================

Title: Apple Cider Syrup
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/apple-cider-syrup-recipe-11774015
Ingredients:
- 2whole cloves
- 1star anise
- 1cinnamon stick
- 6cupsapple cider
Instructions:
1. Tie cloves, star anise, and cinnamon stick in a cheesecloth to make a spice bag. Place in a large saucepan and pour in apple cider.
2. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, about 30 minutes. Discard spice bag. Simmer until reduced to 3⁄4 cup, about 1 hour. Let cool completely. Chill, covered, until ready to serve (or up to 3 weeks).Photographer: Carson Downing / Food Styling: Annie Probst / Prop Styling: Lexi Juhl

========================================

Title: Banana Bread Espresso Martini
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/banana-bread-espresso-martini-recipe-11786326
Ingredients:
- 1 1/2fluidouncesvodka,such as Tito’s®
- 1 1/2fluidouncescrème de banane liqueur,such as Pairidaeza®
- 1fluid ouncebrewedespresso, at room temperature
- 1tablespoonBanana Simple Syrup (recipe beloW)
- 2dashesblack walnut bitters(optional)
- grated nutmeg, espresso beans,banana chips,or cubed banana bread, for garnish
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Photographer: Victor Protasio / Food Styling: Julian Hensarling / Prop Styling: Abby Armstrong
2. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, and add vodka, banana liqueur, espresso, banana simple syrup, and bitters.Photographer: Victor Protasio / Food Styling: Julian Hensarling / Prop Styling: Abby Armstrong
3. Shake until very cold and frothy, about 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass.Photographer: Victor Protasio / Food Styling: Julian Hensarling / Prop Styling: Abby Armstrong
4. Grate nutmeg over martini and garnish with espresso beans, banana chips, or skewered banana bread cubes. Serve immediately.Photographer: Victor Protasio / Food Styling: Julian Hensarling / Prop Styling: Abby ArmstrongMake AheadBanana Simple Syrup: Peel and cut 2 bananas into 1-inch pieces. Combine 1/4 cup light brown sugar, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1/2 cup tap water, 1 (3 inch) cinnamon stick, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, and bananas in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat.Reduce to a simmer over medium heat and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let sit for 10 minutes. Strain into a heatproof glass or bowl. Store in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.

Title: Freddo Cappuccino
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/freddo-cappuccino-recipe-11751610
Ingredients:
- 2shotsespresso
- sugar to taste (optional)
- 1/3cupcoldskim milk
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck
2. Make espresso. Stir in sugar until dissolved; set aside.Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck
3. Froth milk with a handheld milk frother in a cup until foamy and doubled in volume, about 60 seconds.Allrecipes / Julia HartbeckRecipe TipFor more tips on making the perfect foam to top your freddo, seeHow to Make Cold Foam.
4. Fill a serving glass with ice cubes. Pour over the espresso, then top with the foamed milk. Title: Berry Chocolate Protein Smoothie
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/berry-chocolate-protein-smoothie-recipe-11711428
Ingredients:
- 6fluid ouncesalmond milk, such as MALK®
- 3ouncesfrozen strawberries
- 2ouncesfrozen blueberries
- 1scoopchocolate protein powder, such as Premier® or Six Star®
- sugar-free whipped topping(optional)
- sugar free chocolate chips
Instructions:
1. Add almond milk, strawberries, and blueberries to a high-powered blender, such as a Vitamix®. Blend on High for 45 seconds. Turn blender off; add protein powder. Blend for 15 seconds more.
2. Pour mixture into a glass, top with sugar-free whipped topping and sugar-free chocolate chips.Cook’s NoteThe Vitamix is more powerful than a regular blender, such as a ninja. Using a regular blender, you’ll need to blend longer.

========================================

Title: Apple Slush
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/apple-slush-recipe-11791462
Ingredients:
- 1(12-ounce) containerfrozenapple juice concentrate
- 3cupsice
- 1cupcoldwater
- 2tablespoonslemon juice
- 1teaspoonapple pie spice, plus more for garnish (optional)
- air fried apple slices,for garnish
Instructions:
1. Combine apple juice concentrate, ice, water, lemon juice, and apple pie spice in a blender; blend until mixture reaches desired consistency. Garnish with air-fried apple slices and additional apple pie spice.Air Fried Apple SlicesPreheat air fryer to 200 degrees F (93 degrees C). Coat 1/8-inch-thick apple slices with cooking spray; arrange in an even layer in air fryer basket. Cook, turning every 5 to 10 minutes, until starting to brown and dry out and edges curl, 25 to 30 minutes. Transfer cooked apples to a paper towel (apples will crisp as they cool).

========================================

Title: Banana Bread Latte
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/banana-bread-latte-recipe-11789458
Ingredients:
- 1 1/2medium ripebananas, sliced
- 3/4cupbrown sugar substitute, such as Swerve®
- 1/4cupsugar-freemaple-flavored syrup, such as Pyure®
- 3/4cupwater
- 1/2teaspoonsalt
- 1teaspooncinnamon
- 1/2teaspoonbanana extract
- 1/2teaspoonmaple extract
- 1/2teaspoonvanilla extract
- 1/2cuphotcoffee
- 1/2cuphotmilk
- 3tablespoons homemadebanana syrup, or to taste
- 1/4teaspoonsbanana extract
- 1/4cupheavy whipping cream
- 1tablespoon homemadebanana syrup
- 2teaspoonsbutter
- 1/2mediumbanana, sliced
- 1tablespoonsugar-freemaple flavored syrup, such as Pyure®
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Allrecipes / Diana Chistruga
2. Combine bananas, brown sugar substitute, and maple syrup substitute in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Stir until sugar has melted. Add water, increase heat, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in salt, cinnamon, banana extract, maple extract, and vanilla extract. Use an immersion blender to whip until well combined.Allrecipes / Diana Chistruga
3. For the banana cream foam, combine cream and banana syrup in a glass and use a frother to beat until foamy.Allrecipes / Diana Chistruga
4. For caramelized bananas, melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Stir in maple-flavored syrup. Arrange banana slices in a single layer in the skillet and cook until golden brown and caramelized, 3 to 5 minutes.Allrecipes / Diana Chistruga
5. Pour coffee into a mug. Combine banana syrup, banana extract and hot milk in a cup and pour over coffee. Top with banana cream foam and caramelized bananas.Allrecipes / Diana ChistrugaCook’s NoteFor an iced version, make all component as listed up through Step 5. For Step 6, fill a glass with ice, and add 1/2 cup cold milk and 1/2 cup cold coffee. Top with banana cream foam and caramelized bananas.

Title: Freezer Door Pepperon'tini
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/freezer-door-pepperon-tini-recipe-11783106
Ingredients:
- 1 (750 ml) bottlegin, such as Broker's London Dry®
- 3ouncesdry Vermouth, such as Dolin's®
- 3fluidouncesfilteredwater
- 3fluidouncespepperoncini brine
- lemon twist(optional)
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
2. Pour 1 cup gin out of the 750 mLbottle. Set aside for another use. Add Vermouth, filtered water, and pepperoncini brine to the gin bottle.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
3. Chill in the freezer for at least 4 hours, or until ready to serve. If desired, serve with a lemon twist garnish.Allrecipes / Qi AiCook’s NoteBatched martini should last 2 months in the freezer.

Title: Passion Fruit Fizz Martini
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/passion-fruit-fizz-martini-recipe-8786408
Ingredients:
- 1 1/2fluidouncesvodka
- 1fluidouncefrozenpassion fruitpulp, with or without seeds, thawed
- 1fluidouncesimple syrup
- 1/2fluidouncelime juice
- 1cupice
- 3ounceschilledChampagne
Instructions:
1. In a cocktail shaker, combine vodka, passion fruit pulp, simple syrup, lime juice and ice. Shake well until the outside of the shaker is frosted, about 15 seconds.
2. Strain into a martini glass. Use a Hawthorne cocktail strainer to retain passion fruit seeds in the drink, or use a fine mesh strainer to strain out seeds. Top with chilled Champagne, and garnish with lime wheel.

Title: Pickle Lemonade
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/pickle-lemonade-recipe-11759477
Ingredients:
- 1/4cupfreshly-squeezedlemon juice
- 1/4cupdillpickle juice
- 1tablespoonhoney
- 1cuplemon seltzer, such as Polar®
- ice cubes, as needed
- lemon slices, for garnish (optional)
- pickle spear, for garnish (optional)
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
2. Add lemon juice, pickle juice, and honey to a small pitcher or jar, and stir until well combined.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
3. Fill a glass with ice cubes, and pour in pickle-lemon mixture. Top with lemon seltzer, and give it a stir. Taste, and adjust to your preference by adding more honey or more pickle juice, if necessary.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
4. Garnish with lemon slices and a pickle spear, and enjoy.Allrecipes / Qi Ai

Title: Italian Cherry Margarita
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/italian-cherry-margarita-recipe-11775821
Ingredients:
- 2fresh cherries, pitted, or more to taste, plus more for garnish
- 2teaspoonsfresh lime juice
- 1 1/2fluidouncesreposadotequila
- 1fluid ounceamaretto liqueur
Instructions:
1. Place cherries and lime juice in a shaker and muddle to loosen the cherry juices.
2. Fill shaker with ice, add tequila and amaretto, and shake until well blended and slightly frothy.  Strain over ice and garnish with a cherry.Peyton Beckwith

Title: Thai Spice Sweet Tea
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/thai-spice-sweet-tea-recipe-8665228
Ingredients:
- 4 1/4cupswater
- 4cardamompods
- 3wholestar anise
- 3wholecloves
- 1/8teaspoongroundcinnamon
- 1/2teaspoontamarind paste(optional)
- 1/3cupwhite sugar,or to taste
- 5bagsrooibos tea
- 2bagsblack tea
- 3/4cupcoconut milk, blended smooth
Instructions:
1. Add water to a saucepan, and place over medium-high heat.
2. Crush cardamom pods with mortar and pestle or flat of a knife. Add cardamom, star anise, cloves, cinnamon, and tamarind to the saucepan, and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.
3. Add tea bags; stir to combine. As soon as water returns to a simmer, turn off heat, and steep for 5 minutes.
4. Stir in sugar, and let stand 5 minutes more. Strain into a container, squeezing tea bags thoroughly. Wrap container and refrigerate until very cold, about 1 hour.
5. To serve, fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in tea; top with a generous splash of coconut milk.John Mitzewich

========================================

Title: Bramble (Cocktail)
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/bramble-cocktail-recipe-11781007
Ingredients:
- 1cupice cubes
- 2fluidouncesLondon drygin
- 1fluidouncefreshly-squeezedlemon juice
- 1/2ouncesimple syrup
- crushed ice
- 1/2fluidouncecrème de mûre (blackberry liqueur)
- 2 or 3freshblackberries
- 1slicelemon
Instructions:
1. Add ice cubes, gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a cocktail shaker. Seal and shake vigorously until outside is frosted, 10 to 15 seconds.
2. Fill a rocks glass with crushed ice. Strain cocktail into glass, then gently pour crème de mûre over the top to create a layered effect. The crème de mûre will sink down to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with blackberries and a lemon slice.Cook’s NoteIf you like things a little sweeter, double the simple syrup and/or the crème de mûre.

========================================

Title: Screwdriver Jello Shots
Category: drinks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/screwdriver-jello-shots-recipe-11684352
Ingredients:
- 6oranges
- 1/4cupwhitesugar
- 3/4cupvodka
- 1/4cuptriple sec
- 2(1 ounce) packetsgelatin
Instructions:
1. Cut oranges in half and juice them using a reamer. Use a paring knife to loosen the pith from the rind and carefully remove the insides from the orange halves; reserve the hollowed peels.
2. Strain orange juice using a fine mesh strainer over a bowl and add a little water if needed to measure 1 1/2 cups total juice.
3. Add orange juice to a small saucepan and stir in sugar. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring often, until sugar has dissolved.
4. Meanwhile, in a separate bowl, whisk vodka, triple sec, and gelatin together until gelatin dissolves.
5. Pour hot orange juice mixture into the bowl with gelatin mixture and whisk until combined.
6. Place orange peel halves onto a plate or small rimmed baking sheet, side by side to ensure they stay upright. Secure oranges with foil or ramekins as needed to hold them upright during filling and transferring to the refrigerator.
7. Carefully pour orange mixture into each orange peel, making sure to fill each one to the top. Place oranges into the refrigerator and chill until gelatin is firmly set, at least 3 hours.
8. Slice oranges into wedges and serve. Keep chilled until ready to serve.

========================================

Title: The Oktoberfest Beer Cheese Dip Recipe Everyone Will Ask You For
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/beer-cheese-dip-recipe-11694108
Ingredients:
- 2tablespoonsbutter
- 3tablespoonsall-purpose flour
- 1/2cupmilk
- 3/4cupGerman dark beer
- 2teaspoonsstone ground mustard
- 2teaspoonsWorcestershire sauce
- 1cup freshlygrated sharp Cheddar cheese
- 1/2teaspooncrushedAleppo chile peppers (optional)
- salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Allrecipes / Kim Shupe
2. Melt butter In a heavy saucepan over medium heat. Whisk in flour until smooth.Allrecipes / Kim Shupe
3. Continue whisking; pour in milk. Whisk in beer; cook until mixture thickens, 3 to 5 minutes.Allrecipes / Kim Shupe
4. Stir in mustard and Worcestershire sauce. Add cheese; stir until cheese is melted. Stir in Aleppo pepper; season with salt and black pepper.Allrecipes / Kim Shupe
5. Serve immediately.Allrecipes / Kim ShupeCook’s NoteI used a German Dunkel, a dark lager beer. Others to try include Shiner Bock, and Yuengling Black & Tan. The flavor will change based on the beer you choose.Crushed Aleppo pepper is available online; I bought mine from Savory Spice Shop. Ancho chile powder is a good substitute.

Title: Mississippi Chicken Skewers
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/mississippi-chicken-skewers-recipe-11800654
Ingredients:
- 1(1 ounce) packetranch seasoning mix, divided
- 1 (1 ounce) packageau jus seasoning mix, divided
- 2poundsskinless boneless chicken thighs, cut into 2-inch pieces
- 3tablespoonsolive oil
- 15pepperoncini peppers, divided
- 1/4cuppepperoncini brine, divided
- 1red onion, cut into 2-inch pieces
- 6tablespoonscoldbutter, divided
- 3/4cupwater
Instructions:
1. Remove 1 tablespoon of ranch and au jus seasoning mix from each package and set aside.
2. Add chicken to a bowl; add remaining ranch seasoning, remaining au jus seasoning, olive oil, and 2 tablespoons pepperoncini brine to the bowl. Toss well and let stand for 20 to 30 minutes.
3. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Divide and thread chicken, 12 pepperoncini peppers, and onion evenly among skewers.
4. Heat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat, about 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Lightly coat grill grates and place skewers on hot grill or grill pan. Cook until browned and easily released from grill, about 2 minutes on each side. Transfer to a rimmed baking sheet.
5. Bake skewers in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. An instant read thermometer inserted in the center of chicken pieces should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
6. Meanwhile, prepare the sauce. Chop remaining banana peppers very finely. Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a small saucepan over medium-high heat until melted. Add reserved ranch seasoning and au jus seasoning and chopped peppers and cook 1 minute. Add remaining 2 tablespoons brine and water to saucepan and simmer until reduced by half. Cut remaining butter into cubes. Remove sauce from heat and whisk in butter cubes until just melted.
7. Serve skewers with butter sauce.Peyton Beckwith

Title: Banana Bread Muddy Buddies
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/banana-bread-muddy-buddies-recipe-11797143
Ingredients:
- 6cupscinnamon rice cereal squares, such as Rice Chex®
- 1(14 ounce) bagwhite chocolate chips, such as Ghirardelli®
- 1(3.4 ounce) packagebanana cream instant pudding and pie filling, such as Jell-O®
- 2 1/2teaspoonsground cinnamon
- 1/2teaspoonground nutmeg
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients. Place cereal squares in a large glass bowl; set aside.Photographer: Kyle Carpenter / Food Styling: Amanda Holstein / Prop Styling: Josh Hoggle
2. Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl; microwave on High, stirring every 30 seconds, until melted and smooth, about 1 1/2 minutes.Photographer: Kyle Carpenter / Food Styling: Amanda Holstein / Prop Styling: Josh Hoggle
3. Drizzle chocolate mixture over cereal, tossing with your hands until evenly coated.Photographer: Kyle Carpenter / Food Styling: Amanda Holstein / Prop Styling: Josh Hoggle
4. Add pudding mix, cinnamon, and nutmeg to cereal mixture; toss until evenly coated and no large clumps remain.Photographer: Kyle Carpenter / Food Styling: Amanda Holstein / Prop Styling: Josh Hoggle

Title: Asparagus Ricotta Tart
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/asparagus-ricotta-tart-recipe-11735347
Ingredients:
- 1poundfreshasparagus, trimmed to 8-inch lengths
- 1cupfull fat ricotta cheese
- 1largeegg
- 1/4cupfreshly grated Asiago cheese
- 1 1/2tablespoonsItalian seasoning
- 1/2teaspoonkosher salt, or to taste
- 1/4teaspoonfreshlyground black pepper,or to taste
- 1sheetrefrigeratedpuff pastry
- 1tablespoonolive oil
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and add asparagus. Cook until slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove asparagus from the pot and immediately dunk them in cold water. Drain; blot asparagus dry with a paper towel.
3. Crack egg into a small bowl and beat lightly. Measure out about 1 tablespoon beaten egg and set aside to use for egg wash. To the bowl with remaining egg, add ricotta, Asiago cheese, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper and whisk until thoroughly combined.
4. Roll puff pastry out on a lightly floured surface into a large rectangle, about 10x15 inches, and place onto the prepared baking sheet. Dip a pastry brush into remaining beaten egg, and brush a 1-inch border around the edges of pastry.
5. Add ricotta filling to center of the puff pastry and smooth into an even layer, leaving a 1-inch border on all sides. Arrange asparagus over filling. Drizzle asparagus with olive oil and season with salt and pepper, if desired.
6. Bake tart in the preheated oven until puff pastry is puffed and browned on the edges, 25 to 30 minutes. Cool tart for a few minutes, then cut into 8 squares. Serve slightly warm or at room temperature.

========================================

Title: The Best Chicken Satay
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/the-best-chicken-satay-recipe-11780842
Ingredients:
- 1tablespoonThai-stylered curry paste
- 4teaspoonscurry powder
- 1 1/2teaspoonskosher salt
- 1teaspoonwhite sugar
- 1teaspoonbrown sugar
- 1teaspoonfish sauce
- 1/3cupfull fatcoconut milk
- 1 1/2poundsskinless, boneless chicken thighs
- bamboo skewers
- 1/2cupsmoothall-natural peanut butter
- 1/2cupfull fatcoconut milk
- 2clovesgarlic, crushed
- 1tablespoonbrown sugar
- 2teaspoonsfish sauce
- 2teaspoonssoy sauce
- 1lime, juiced
- 1teaspoonsesame oil
- 1teaspoonSriracha hot sauce, or to taste
- 2tablespoonswater,or more as needed
- 2tablespoonsslicedred chilies
- 1/4cupchoppedroasted peanuts
- 1/4cupchopped cilantro leaves
- lime wedges(optional)
Instructions:
1. For marinade, combine curry paste, curry powder, salt, white sugar, brown sugar, fish sauce, and coconut milk in a bowl. Stir until smooth and set aside.
2. Cut chicken thighs into approximately 1-inch pieces, and transfer into the marinade. Mix thoroughly, then wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or up to overnight before grilling.
3. For peanut sauce, add peanut butter, coconut milk, garlic, brown sugar, fish sauce, soy sauce, lime juice, sesame oil, and Sriracha to a bowl and whisk thoroughly together. Add water if desired to thin the sauce. Taste for seasoning, and adjust if necessary. Wrap and refrigerate until needed.
4. Soak bamboo skewers in water for at least 30 minutes before using.
5. Once chicken is marinated, skewer chicken pieces on bamboo so that the meat is touching, but not pressed tightly together.
6. Prepare a charcoal grill. Charcoal should be ashy white and very hot. Brush the grates lightly with oil.
7. Grill chicken over charcoal until chicken firms up and springs back to the touch, 4 to 5 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

========================================

Title: Dallas' Spicy Habanero Salsa
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/dallas-spicy-habanero-salsa-recipe-11799448
Ingredients:
- 3tablespoonsextra-virgin olive oil, divided
- 3habanero peppers
- 2Roma tomatoes
- 2garlic cloves, peeled
- 1/4white onion
- 1 1/2teaspoonschicken bouillon powder,such as Knorr®
Instructions:
1. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a cast iron skillet. Once heated, add habaneros, tomatoes, garlic, and onion. Roast until charred., about 8 minutes
2. Place roasted veggies, remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, and chicken bouillon in a blender cup and blend until smooth.

Title: Jalapeno Popper Potato Skins
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/jalapeno-popper-potato-skins-recipe-11808261
Ingredients:
- 6small to mediumrusset potatoes,scrubbed and thoroughly rinsed
- 1tablespoonvegetable oil
- 4stripsbacon
- 8largejalapeno peppers, or more as needed
- 1(8 ounce) packagecream cheese, softened
- 6ouncesCheddar cheese, grated
- 1/4teaspoonsalt, or to taste
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a sheet pan with foil.
2. Prick potatoes all over with the tip of a knife. Coat potatoes all over with oil, and place on the prepared sheet pan.
3. Bake in the preheated oven until centers of potatoes are soft when pierced with a knife, about 1 hour. Let cool until just warm, about 10 minutes.
4. Meanwhile, place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels; chop when cool enough to handle, and set aside.
5. Slice the large center parts of jalapenos into 36 thick rings, and remove the seeds. Dice remaining parts of peppers, and additional peppers as needed to make about 1/2 cup, or more if desired.
6. Add cream cheese and diced jalapeno to a bowl. Set aside about 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese for sprinkling on top of poppers, and add remaining cheese to the bowl. Mix well and set aside.
7. Lay each potato down on its widest, flattest side on a cutting board, and cut in half lengthwise. Scoop out cooked potato into a bowl, leaving about 1/8-inch of cooked potato attached to the skin.
8. Line a sheet pan with foil and coat with oil. Transfer scooped potato skins onto the sheet and season each one with salt. Divide cheese filling between the 12 potato skins, and spread out with a spoon.
9. Top cheese filling with bacon, and then place 3 jalapeno rings on top of each skin. Scatter reserved cheese over the top.
10. Increase the oven temperature to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).
11. Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is bubbling, and the edges of the potatoes are crispy, 25 to 30 minutes.John Mitzewich

========================================

Title: Gochujang Pork Belly Bites
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/gochujang-pork-belly-bites-recipe-11784193
Ingredients:
- 1poundpork belly, cut into bite-sized pieces
- 1/4cupgochujang
- 2tablespoonssoy sauce
- 1tablespoonhothoney,such as Mike's® Hot Honey
- 1teaspoonground ginger
Instructions:
1. Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2. Place pork belly pieces in the basket in a single layer, not touching. Air fry for 8 to 9 minutes; turn over and air fry for 6 to 7 minutes more.
3. Meanwhile, for sauce, stir gochujang, soy sauce, hot honey, and ginger together in a medium bowl.
4. Remove pork belly from air fryer basket; toss in sauce to coat. Return to the air fryer and fry until bites begin to char at the edges, 8 to 11 minutes more. (Alternately, you can use sauce only for dipping; in this case, continue to fry without removing bites, until they begin to char, 6 to 7 minutes.)

Title: Maple, Apple, and Pecans Baked Brie
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/maple-apple-and-pecans-baked-brie-recipe-11791361
Ingredients:
- 1(8-ounce)wheel Brie cheese (about 5-inch diameter)
- 1mediumapple, thinly sliced
- 2tablespoonspure maple syrup
- 2tablespoonschopped toastedpecans
- snipped fresh rosemary (optional)
- crackers, toasted baguette slices, and/or apple slices, for serving
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2. Slice off and discard top rind of Brie wheel. Put Brie in a pie dish.
3. Bake in the preheated oven until Brie is warmed through, about 15 minutes. Top with apple slices, maple syrup, pecans, and (if using) rosemary. Serve with crackers, baguette slices, and/or apple slices.

Title: Mississippi Pot Roast Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/mississippi-pot-roast-dip-recipe-11750750
Ingredients:
- 16ouncessour cream
- 1/2cupmayonnaise
- 1(1 ounce) packetau jus mix
- 1(1 ounce) packetranch seasoning
- 3/4cupchopped pepperoncinipeppers,divided
- 3tablespoonspepperoncini brine from the jar
- potato chips for serving
Instructions:
1. Combine sour cream, mayonnaise, au jus mix, and ranch seasoning in a bowl and stir well.  Fold in 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon peppers and brine into sour cream mixture until well combined.
2. Transfer dip to a serving bowl and top with remaining chopped peppers. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Serve with potato chips.Peyton Beckwith

Title: The Best Garlic Knots—No-Knead, No-Rise!
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/garlic-knots-recipe-11701932
Ingredients:
- 1 ¾cupsself-rising flour, plus more for kneading
- ¾teaspoongarlic powder, divided
- ½teaspoonsalt, divided
- ¼teaspoonItalian seasoning
- 1cupplain whole-milk Greek-style yogurt
- 1tablespoonunsalted butter, melted
- 1tablespoonolive oil
- ½teaspoondried parsley
- flaky sea salt, for garnish
Instructions:
1. Gather ingredients. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat.Allrecipes/Kim Shupe
2. Stir together flour, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and Italian seasoning in a bowl. Stir in yogurt until mixture forms a shaggy dough.Allrecipes/Kim Shupe
3. Transfer dough to a well-floured work surface. Knead until mostly smooth, 3 to 4 minutes. If needed, add additional flour 1 teaspoon at a time to keep dough from being too sticky.Allrecipes/Kim Shupe
4. Shape dough into a ball; press down gently to form a disk. Divide disk into 8 even wedges (a bench scraper is handy). Roll each wedge into a rope about 10 inches long.Allrecipes/Kim Shupe
5. Tie each into a knot. Arrange knots about 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheet.Allrecipes/Kim Shupe
6. Bake until knots are lightly browned, about 15 minutes.Allrecipes/Kim Shupe
7. Meanwhile, whisk together melted butter, oil, parsley, remaining 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, and remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt in a small bowl.Allrecipes/Kim Shupe
8. Brush still-warm knots with butter mixture and sprinkle with flaky salt. Cool 5 minutes before serving. Store cooled knots in an airtight container at room temperature up to 2 days.Allrecipes/Kim ShupeRecipe developed by Nicole Hopper

2. Keep refrigerated until ready to serve.Peyton Beckwith

Title: Ginger Lime Pork Spring Rolls
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/ginger-lime-pork-rolls-recipe-11813216
Ingredients:
- 1poundground pork
- salt to taste
- groundwhite pepper to taste
- 1 1/2teaspoonsginger paste or grated fresh ginger
- 1lime, zested and juiced, divided
- 8rice spring roll wrappers
- 1bunchgreen onions, halved and thinly sliced
- 1cupcilantro leaves
- soy sauce, as needed for dipping (optional)
Instructions:
1. Cook ground pork in a skillet over medium heat until no longer pink, about 7 minutes. Season meat with salt (or add a splash of soy sauce), and season with white pepper. Stir 1 minute; remove from heat.
2. Transfer meat to a bowl and cool slightly. Add ginger and lime zest. Cut lime in half and squeeze in juice from 1/2 lime; mix well.
3. Dip rice wrappers in warm water for about 10 seconds, then transfer to a cutting board. Spread about 2 tablespoons meat mixture along the bottom edge of wrapper.
4. Lay some green onion and cilantro leaves on top of meat. Fold the bottom of the wrapper up over meat, then fold in sides. Roll wrapper up to seal.
5. Serve with soy sauce for dipping.Cook’s NoteOnce rolled, these can also be fried in the air fryer.

========================================

Title: Green Goddess Feta Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/green-goddess-feta-dip-recipe-11804288
Ingredients:
- 5ouncesfeta cheese
- 1avocado,peeled and pitted
- 3/4cupolive oil
- 2limes, juiced
- 1/4cupfresh parsley leaves
- 1/2cupfresh cilantro leaves
- 1/4cupchoppedgreen onions
- 1garlic clove
- 1/2teaspoonfreshlyground black pepper
- salt to taste
Instructions:
1. Add feta, avocado, olive oil, lime juice, parsley, cilantro, green onions, garlic, and black pepper to the bowl of a food processor; blend until smooth. Season to taste with salt.

========================================

Title: Peperoncini Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/peperoncini-dip-recipe-11770271
Ingredients:
- 1(8-ounce) packagecream cheese, softened
- 1/4cupsour cream
- 2tablespoonsbrine from peperoncini jar
- 1⁄2cuppeperoncini peppers -stemmed, seeded, and chopped
- 1cupmixed giardiniera (pickled mixed vegetables), chopped
- 1/4cupfinely choppedred onion
- 1teaspoonItalian seasoning
- 1/4teaspoonkosher salt
- 1/8teaspooncrushed red pepper
- baguette slices, ridged potato chips, and/or vegetables, for dipping
Instructions:
1. Beat cream cheese in a bowl with an electric mixer at medium speed for 30 seconds. Beat in sour cream and peperoncini brine until mixture is smooth. Beat in peperoncini, giardiniera, red onion, Italian seasoning, salt, and crushed red pepper until combined.
2. Chill, covered, to allow flavors to meld, at least 1 hour (or up to 1 week). Serve with baguette slices, potato chips, and/or vegetables for dipping.

Title: Savory Palmiers
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/savory-palmiers-recipe-11763621
Ingredients:
- 1sheetpuff pastry, thawed
- 1/4cuphorseradish sauce or honey mustard dressing, plus more for dipping
- 1/2cupshreddedgruyere cheese
- 1/3cupchoppedcaramelized onion
- 2slicesthick cut bacon, cooked and crumbled
Instructions:
1. Lay puff pastry out on a lightly floured surface. Brush pastry with horseradish sauce. Sprinkle evenly with gruyere. Sprinkle onions evenly over, then scatter evenly with bacon.
2. Starting with a long side, roll and tuck pastry to the center. Repeat on the other long side, rolling until the 2 scrolled sides meet in the center. Pinch together to ensure they hold together. Wrap pastry in plastic wrap and freeze for about 20 minutes.
3. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment.
4. Remove pastry to a cutting board. Slice into 1/3-inch slices; lay slices on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Bake in the preheated oven until until golden brown and puffed, 15 to 20 minutes. Rotate pan halfway through cooking time. Serve with more horseradish sauce for dipping.From the EditorYou can purchase caramelized onion, or follow these instructions tocaramelize onionsat home.Here's an easy way to cook a few slices ofbacon in the microwave.

========================================

Title: Pissaladière (Southern French “Pizza”)
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/pissaladiere-southern-french-pizza-recipe-11787803
Ingredients:
- 1 1/4cupswater
- 1teaspoondry active "rapid rise" yeast
- 1tablespoonolive oil, plus more for greasing parchment
- 3cupsall-purpose flour
- 1 1/2teaspoonskosher salt
- 4ouncesolive oil-packed anchovy filets
- 2tablespoonsolive oil
- 4tablespoonsunsalted butter
- 5largeyellow onions- peeled, halved, and thinly sliced
- 1/2teaspoonkosher salt
- 6fresh thymesprigs
- 2tablespoonssherry vinegar
- 1/4teaspoonfreshlyground black pepper
- 20pittedKalamata or Nicoiseolives, rinsed well, halved lengthwise
- finely chopped chives,for garnish (optional)
Instructions:
1. For dough, add water and yeast to a bowl; let stand for 10 minutes. Stir in olive oil, flour, and salt, and knead until a very sticky, elastic dough is formed, about 4 minutes. Cover and let rise in a warm spot until doubled in size, about 1 hour.
2. Punch down dough to remove the air bubbles, and transfer to a floured work surface. Form into a smooth ball of dough.
3. Grease a parchment paper sheet with olive oil; and transfer dough onto the sheet; grease another parchment sheet and lay it on top of the dough. Press out dough with your hands to form a rectangle, then switch to a rolling pin and roll dough out to cover nearly the entire surface of the paper.
4. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (235 degrees C). Transfer dough with both sheets of parchment onto a sheet pan. Carefully peel off the top sheet of paper, and then use a fork to prick the dough all over.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Remove to cool on a rack; set aside until needed.
6. Transfer anchovies into a bowl and cover with 4 cups of cold water. Gently separate the fillets and let soak for 1 hour. Water may be changed halfway through to remove more salt from anchovies. Drain and pat dry on paper towels.
7. For caramelized onions, add butter and olive oil to a heavy-bottomed pot, and place over medium-high heat. Add onions and salt, and toss occasionally with a spatula, until onions just begin to slump down in the pot. Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook for 10 minutes.
8. Uncover; reduce heat to medium low. Cook, stirring occasionally, until onions are a light golden brown, about 1 hour. Add thyme, sherry vinegar, and black pepper. For a slightly more intense version, a few anchovy fillets can be added to the onions at this point. Cook, stirring, for another 10 to 15 minutes. Turn off heat and let cool.
9. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (235 degrees C).
10. Line a baking sheet with a fresh sheet of parchment, and grease with olive oil. Place crust on the prepared sheet. For a crispier edge, brush 1-inch of the outside edge of dough with olive oil. Spread caramelized onions over crust, going nearly to the edge.
11. Place half of the anchovies in diagonal rows, spaced a couple inches apart, on top of the onions, then place the other half of anchovies in diagonal rows in the other direction to form the classic pissaladiere decoration. Place an olive half inside each opening in the grid formed by anchovies.
12. Bake in the preheated oven until edges of the crust are browned, and the bottom is golden, about 25 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to ool for about 5 minutes. Cut in squares and serve.John MitzewichChef's NotePie crust dough or frozen puff pastry can also be used for this, following the same procedure.Fresh marinated anchovies, also known as boquerones, can also be used instead of olive oil-packed anchovies.

========================================

Title: Loaded BLT Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/loaded-blt-dip-recipe-11802673
Ingredients:
- 1(8 ounce) packagecream cheese,softened
- 8ouncessour cream
- 1/2cupmayonnaise
- 1(1 ounce) packageranch seasoning mix
- 1cupshredded Cheddar cheese
- 1/4headiceberg lettuce,finely chopped
- 2roma tomatoes, seeded and chopped
- 6slicesbacon, cooked crisp and crumbled
- potato chips, for serving
Instructions:
1. Combine cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, and ranch seasoning in a bowl until well blended. Spread mixture evenly into a deep serving dish or pie plate.
2. Top cream cheese mixture evenly in layers with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and bacon. Serve with chips.From the EditorHere's how tocook bacon in the microwave.

Title: Jalapeno Spinach Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/jalapeno-spinach-dip-recipe-11813685
Ingredients:
- 1tablespoonbutter or olive oil
- 2green onions, sliced, white part only
- 2freshjalapenos, seeded and chopped
- 1teaspoonminced garlic
- 1(8 ounce) bagfresh spinach,chopped
- 1teaspoonGreens seasoning,or more to taste
- 2tablespoonswater
- 1(8 ounce) packagecream cheese, softened
- 1/2cupmayonnaise
- 1/2cupshredded Parmesan, plus more for topping
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).Allrecipes / Qi Ai
2. Heat butter or olive oil in a cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add green onions, jalapenos, and garlic; cook and stir for 1 to 2 minutes.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
3. Add spinach, greens seasoning, and water. Cook and stir until spinach is wilted, about 3 minutes.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
4. Stir cream cheese and mayonnaise together in a separate bowl; stir in spinach and Parmesan cheese. Spread evenly into an oven safe dish. Sprinkle with a little Parmesan.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
5. Bake in the preheated oven until hot and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes.Allrecipes / Qi Ai

Title: Mexican-Style Marinated Cheese
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/mexican-style-marinated-cheese-recipe-11751954
Ingredients:
- 1(8 ounce) blocksharp Cheddar cheese
- 1(8 ounce) blockpepper Jack cheese
- 8ouncescream cheese
- 1jalapeno, finely chopped
- 1/4cupmincedred onion
- 1/2cupfinelychopped cilantro
- 3tablespoonsfreshlime juice
- 2tablespoonsred wine vinegar
- 1teaspoonchili powder
- 1teaspoonkosher salt
- 1/2cupextra-virgin olive oil
Instructions:
1. Place Cheddar, pepper Jack, and cream cheese blocks in the freezer for 15 minutes.
2. Meanwhile, add jalapeno, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, red wine vinegar, chili powder, salt, and olive oil to a bowl and stir until well blended; set aside.
3. Cut each block of Cheddar and Jack cheese in half lengthwise and then cut each piece into 1/4-inch square pieces.  Cut a small piece off of the cream cheese and place it between alternating flavors of cheese.  Place the alternating cheese slices on their slides in the bottom of a small casserole or shallow dish.  This can be done in 2 to 4 rows depending on the size of the dish.
4. Pour the reserved marinade over the cheeses, cover, and refrigerate at least 2 hours or up to overnight.

Title: Ritz Bits Puppy Chow
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/ritz-bits-puppy-chow-recipe-11799189
Ingredients:
- 1cupchocolate chips
- 1/2cupcreamy peanut butter
- 1/4cupbutter
- 1/2cuppowdered sugar
- 1 (8.8 ounce) boxes Ritz Bits
Instructions:
1. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Combine chocolate chips, peanut butter, and butter in a sauce pan over low heat. Heat until chocolate has melted and sauce is creamy, about 3 minutes.
3. Empty ritz bits into a bowl and pour chocolate sauce over the bits; toss to coat.
4. Add powdered sugar, cover the bowl and shake. Alternatively you can use a resealable bag.
5. Spread out bits on the prepared baking sheet and allow to cool.Peyton Beckwith

========================================

Title: Taco Beef Lettuce Cups
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/taco-beef-lettuce-cups-recipe-11735386
Ingredients:
- 1tablespoonavocado oil or other vegetable oil
- 1bunchgreen onions
- 1poundlean ground beef
- 1teaspoonkosher salt, plus more to taste
- 1/2teaspoonfreshly groundblack pepper
- 1/2teaspoongarlic powder
- 1tablespoonchili powder
- 2teaspoonsgroundcumin
- 1pinchcayenne pepper, or to taste
- 1/2teaspoonoregano, preferably Mexican oregano
- 1tablespoontomato paste
- 1/4cupketchup
- 1/2cupwater
- 12butter lettuce leaves
- 1/2cupshredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
- 1/4cupdicedred onion
- 1/2cupdicedtomato
Instructions:
1. Add oil to a nonstick skillet, and place over high heat. Add white and light green parts of sliced green onion; reserve the darker green part for garnish. Add beef, and use a spatula to break into small crumbles, about 5 minutes.
2. Reduce the heat to medium-high. Add salt, black pepper, garlic powder, chili powder, cumin, oregano, tomato paste, and ketchup and cook, stirring, for about 2 minutes.
3. Use a spatula to smooth and pat the mixture down into an even layer. Let cook without stirring for 1 to 2 minutes more, or until the pieces of meat start to form a brown crust. Give the mixture a stir and repeat the browning process once more.
4. Add in the water, and continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until the meat mixture reaches your desired texture, 1 to 2 more minutes—cook briefly for a saucier version, or longer for a dryer, stickier version. More liquid can always be added to the pan to adjust if needed.
5. Taste for seasoning, and adjust if needed. To serve, spoon beef into lettuce cups, and garnish with grated cheese, red onion, and tomato. Finish by sprinkling with reserved dark green onion tops.John Mitzewich

========================================

Title: Italian Sushi
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/italian-sushi-recipe-11806926
Ingredients:
- 3slicesprosciutto
- 15basil leaves
- 3Roma tomatoes, sliced
- ground black pepper to taste
- 3slicesprovolone cheese
- balsamic vinegar, as needed
Instructions:
1. Lay a piece of parchment on a work surface. Lay 3 slices of prosciutto on the paper, making sure each piece slightly overlaps the other.
2. Cover prosciutto with basil leaves, about 5 leaves per slice. Layer tomatoes on top of basil. Season with pepper.
3. Tear provolone cheese into pieces, then lay on top of tomatoes. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar.
4. Starting from the bottom edge, gently roll prosciutto upwards into a cylinder. Wrap roll in the parchment, compressing it slightly so that it holds together.
5. Refrigerate the roll until ready to serve. Slice the roll into even pieces and remove parchment. Drizzle with more balsamic vinegar.Cook’s NoteThis recipe is easy to vary - substitute sun-dried tomatoes for fresh, or use a soft cheese like fresh mozzarella or burrata.

========================================

Title: Smoked Queso Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/smoked-queso-dip-recipe-11754302
Ingredients:
- 1onion, chopped
- 1(1 pound) tube bulksausage, crumbled
- 2poundsprocessed cheese food, such as Velveeta®, cubed
- 8ouncesCheddar cheese, shredded
- 2(10 ounce) cansdiced tomatoes with green chiles, such as Ro-tel®
- 1(10.5 ounce) cancondensed cream of chicken soup
- 2large wholejalapeno peppers
Instructions:
1. Preheat an outdoor smoker to 225 degrees F (107 degrees C).
2. Add onion and sausage to a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat for 8 minutes. Drain any excess grease and add sausage back to the skillet.
3. To the skillet, add Velveeta, shredded Cheddar, Ro-tel and cream of chicken soup. Stir to combine. Transfer to a 9x9-inch disposable aluminum pan.
4. Place pan on a rack in the smoker. Place whole jalapenos next to the pan. Smoke for 2 hours, stirring the cheese mixture every hour.
5. Transfer jalapenos to a cutting board. Cut in half lengthwise. Discard seeds and vein. Chop jalapenos and stir into the cheese mixture.
6. Smoke for 1 hour more. Stir and serve immediately.

========================================

Title: 2-Ingredient Bacon-Wrapped Mozzarella Sticks
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/2-ingredient-bacon-wrapped-mozzarella-sticks-recipe-11724685
Ingredients:
- 4mozzarella string cheese sticks
- 4slicesthin-cutbacon
- 1/4cupavocado oil
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients. Place mozzarella sticks in the freezer until completely frozen, about 30 minutes.Allrecipes/Diana Chistruga
2. Wrap each stick with 1 slice of bacon, tucking ends in so cheese is completely covered. Secure bacon on the ends with a toothpick if necessary.Allrecipes/Diana Chistruga
3. Heat oil in a skillet to medium heat. Fry cheese sticks in hot oil, turning gently to brown and crisp on all sides.Allrecipes/Diana Chistruga
4. Remove from skillet; pat with paper towels to soak up any excess oil. Serve with dipping sauce.Allrecipes/Diana ChistrugaCook’s NoteFor an easy garlic aioli dipping sauce, stir 1 teaspoon mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon garlic paste, and 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard together in a small bowl. Refrigerate until ready to use.

Title: Spicy Pickle Ranch Crackers
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/spicy-pickle-ranch-crackers-recipe-11744518
Ingredients:
- 1 1/4cupsvegetable oil
- 2tablespoonspickle juice
- 1tablespoonpaprika
- 1tablespoondried dill
- 1tablespoonred pepper flakes
- 1packetranch seasoning mix
- 1(16-ounce) boxmini saltine crackers
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F ( 120 degrees C).
2. Combine oil, pickle juice, paprika, dill, red pepper flakes, and ranch seasoning in a large bowl. Mix until combined.
3. Add saltines to the bowl and gently toss until crackers are well coated. Spread crackers out onto a rimmed baking sheet
4. Bake in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes.
5. Allow crackers to cool before serving.Peyton BeckwithFrom the EditorNutrition data for this recipe includes the full amount of oil. The actual amount of oil consumed will vary.

Title: Bacon-Wrapped Chicken Skewers
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/bacon-wrapped-chicken-skewers-recipe-11797324
Ingredients:
- 1poundchicken breast, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
- 1/2tablespoonolive oil
- 1/4teaspoonsmoked paprika
- 1/4teaspoongarlic powder
- 1/4teaspoononion powder
- 1/4teaspooncelery seed
- salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
- 8slicesbacon, cut in half crosswise
- 1/3cuppreparedbarbecue sauce
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) and line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil.
2. Place chicken pieces in a large bowl. Add oil, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, celery seed, salt, and pepper. Toss to evenly coat.
3. Take a chicken piece and roll tightly in bacon half. Repeat with remaining chicken pieces.
4. Skewer bacon wrapped chicken pieces tightly on a skewer and place on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Bake skewers in the preheated oven 30 minutes. Brush BBQ sauce over skewers. Bake until evenly browned, about 5 minutes more.

Title: Untitled Recipe
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipes/404/appetizers-and-snacks/dips-and-spreads/cheese-dips-and-spreads/cheese-balls/

Title: Firecracker Chicken Meatballs
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/firecracker-chicken-meatballs-recipe-11785511
Ingredients:
- 1largeegg, lightly beaten
- 2tablespoonsminced seededjalapeno pepper
- 1tablespoonreduced-sodium soy sauce
- 1teaspoononion powder
- 1teaspoonground ginger
- 2garlic cloves, peeled and pressed
- freshlyground black pepper to taste
- 1poundground chicken
- 1/2cupplainpanko breadcrumbs
- 1/2cuphot sauce, such asFrank’s Red Hot® Buffalo Wing Sauce
- 1/2cupbrown sugar
- 1tablespoonreduced-sodium soy sauce
- 2teaspoonscider vinegar
- 1teaspoonWorcestershire sauce
- 1/4teaspooncrushed red pepper flakes
- choppedfresh parsley for garnish
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). Line a large baking sheet with foil, and lightly spray with cooking spray.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
2. Stir egg, jalapeño, soy sauce, onion powder, ginger, garlic, and pepper together in a large bowl. Add ground chicken and breadcrumbs, and gently mix just until just combined.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
3. Form into meatballs using a 2-tablespoon cookie scoop; shape with wet hands. Place on the prepared baking sheet.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
4. Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink at the center, 8 to 10 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (71 degrees C).Allrecipes / Qi Ai
5. Meanwhile, for firecracker sauce, combine hot sauce, brown sugar, soy sauce, vinegar, Worcestershire, and red pepper flakes in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, then remove from heat to cool. The sauce will thicken slightly as it cools.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
6. Dip each meatball into sauce or brush each meatball with sauce, return to the baking sheet, and cook for an additional 1 to 2 minutes.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
7. Drizzle or brush with additional sauce as desired, sprinkle with chopped parsley, and serve. Serve remaining sauce on the side for dipping.Allrecipes / Qi AiCook’s NoteChoose a brand of hot sauce based on how spicy you prefer your food, and adjust the amount as needed. I recommend Frank’s Red Hot® Buffalo Wing Sauce, a milder hot sauce, if your family is not into really hot, spicy food.

========================================

Title: Chef John’s Mexican Street Corn Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/chef-john-s-mexican-street-corn-dip-recipe-11756076
Ingredients:
- 4earssweet corn
- 3tablespoonsolive oil
- 1 ½teaspoonskosher salt, or to taste
- 1/4teaspooncayenne pepper
- 1/2teaspoonfreshlyground black pepper
- 2tablespoonschili powder, or to taste
- 1/4teaspoondried oregano, preferably Mexican oregano
- 1/2cupmincedred onion plus more for garnish
- 4ouncessoftenedcream cheese
- 1/2cupmayonnaise
- 1/3cupsour cream
- 1/2cupfinely grated Mexicancotija cheeseor finely grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4teaspoongarlic powder
- 1lime juiced, plus more to taste
- 1/3cupchopped cilantro plus more for garnish
- 1/2cupavocado oil
- 2clovesgarlic,peeled
- 1red Fresnochili, seeded and sliced
- 1pinchsalt
- 1/4teaspoonsmoked paprika
Instructions:
1. Slice corn kernels from corn cobs into a bowl; set aside.
2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat and add corn once the oil is hot. Press and pat down into an even layer, and let cook for about 2 minutes without stirring, until the corn begins to brown and starts to pop.
3. Add salt, cayenne, black pepper, chili powder, oregano, and red onion. Cook, stirring, until corn is no longer raw but not yet beginning to soften, about 2 minutes. Turn off the heat, and let cool to room temperature in the pan.
4. Add cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, cotija cheese, and garlic powder to a bowl; stir together with a spatula until combined. Add corn mixture, lime juice, and cilantro; stir until evenly combined. Cover and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled, at least 1 hour.
5. Meanwhile, for the garlic fresno chili oil combine avocado oil, garlic, Fresno chili, salt, and smoked paprika in a blender cup; blend until very smooth. Strain through a fine mesh sieve into a small bowl and reserve until needed. This will make more than you will need, and the extra chili oil can be stored in the refrigerator to use in other recipes.
6. Remove dip from the refrigerator, stir, and taste for seasoning. Squeeze in more fresh lime juice, and add more salt if needed. Stir and transfer into a serving bowl. Sprinkle the top with a little grated cotija cheese, drizzle with 1 to 2 tablespoons garlic chili oil, and more diced red onion and chopped cilantro if desired.John Mitzewich

========================================

Title: Crispy Coconut Shrimp Tacos
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/crispy-coconut-shrimp-tacos-recipe-11748596
Ingredients:
- 1poundcolossalshrimp, peelend and deveined
- 1/2cupall purpose flour
- 1/2teaspoonsalt
- 1/4teaspoonfreshlyground black pepper
- 1largeegg
- 1/4cupunsweetened coconut milk
- 3/4cuppanko bread crumbs
- 3/4cupshredded coconut (sweetened or unsweetened)
- cooking spray
- 1cupchoppedfresh pineapple
- 1/2largeavocado - peeled, seeded, and finely chopped
- 1/4cupfinely choppedred bell pepper
- 1/4cupfinely choppedred onion
- 1/4cup coarsely choppedfresh cilantro
- 1tablespoonlime juice
- 1tablespoonhot pepper sauce, plus more for serving (optional)
- 1/2cupsour cream
- 1/4cupchoppedfresh cilantro
- 1tablespoonmayonnaise
- 2teaspoonslime juice
- 1/4teaspoonsalt
- 8(6-inch)corn tortillas, warmed
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna Ghazali
2. Pat shrimps dry with paper towels.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna Ghazali
3. Combine flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper in a shallow bowl. Whisk together egg and coconut milk in another shallow bowl. Stir together panko and shredded coconut in a third shallow bowl.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna Ghazali
4. With basket inserted in the appliance, preheat air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. Preheat oven to 170 degrees F (77 degrees C) (or the warm setting).
5. Working in batches, dredge shrimp in flour mixture to coat, shaking off excess. Dip shrimp in egg mixture, letting excess drip off, and toss shrimp in panko mixture, pressing gently to adhere. Place breaded shrimp on a large plate. Generously coat shrimp on top and sides with cooking spray.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna Ghazali
6. Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna GhazaliCoat the air-fryer basket generously with the cooking spray. Arrange half of the shrimp in the prepared basket. Do not crowd shrimp. Air-fry until shrimp are golden brown and crispy, shaking the basket or turning the shrimp once halfway through cooking, 7 to 9 minutes. Transfer cooked shrimp to a baking sheet and place in the warm oven while cooking the remaining shrimp.
7. For salsa, combine pineapple, avocado, bell pepper, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and hot sauce in a small bowl.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna Ghazali
8. For crema, combine sour cream, cilantro, mayonnaise, lime juice, and salt in a small bowl.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna Ghazali
9. Divide hot coconut shrimp (about two each) among tortillas. Spoon salsa over shrimp and top with crema. Serve immediately with additional hot sauce if you like.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Holly Dreesman / Shannon Goforth / Prop Styling: Breanna Ghazali

========================================

Title: Air Fryer Honey Sriracha Salmon Bites
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/air-fryer-honey-sriracha-salmon-bites-recipe-11736471
Ingredients:
- 1tablespoonsoy sauce
- 1tablespoonhoney
- 1tablespoonSriracha
- 1teaspoonrice vinegar
- 1/4teaspoongranulated garlic
- 1poundcenter-cutsalmon fillet, skin removed
- 1/2tablespoonolive oil
- 1/2tablespoonSriracha
- salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
- cooking spray
- 1green onion,finely chopped
- 1teaspoonsesame seeds
Instructions:
1. Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2. Whisk soy sauce, honey, 1 tablespoon Sriracha, rice vinegar, and granulated garlic together in a small bowl. Set aside.
3. Pat salmon dry and cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes. Toss salmon in olive oil, 1/2 tablespoon Sriracha, salt, and pepper.
4. Spray basket of the air fryer with cooking spray. Place seasoned salmon in the basket of the air fryer, working in batches to avoid overcrowding, if necessary.
5. Cook in the preheated air fryer for 4 minutes. Gently turn salmon pieces and cook until salmon flakes easily with a fork, 3 to 4 more minutes. Place on a serving platter, drizzle with honey-Sriracha sauce, and garnish with green onion and sesame seeds. Serve immediately.Cook’s NoteTry to find center-cut salmon filets that are at least 1-inch thick. I usually buy extra salmon, and trim off the thinner outer edges, saving for another use.

========================================

Title: Chicken Adobo Tacos
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/chicken-adobo-tacos-recipe-11711210
Ingredients:
- 1/3cupsoy sauce
- 1/3cupwhite vinegar
- 3bay leaves
- 1teaspoongranulated garlic
- 1 1/2poundsskinless, boneless chicken thighs
- 2tablespoonsoil, divided
- 1/2cupdiced onion
- 3garlic cloves, minced
- 1 1/2cupswater
- 2tablespoonsbrown sugar
- 1teaspoonfreshly ground black pepper,or to taste
- 8(8-inch)flour tortillas
- chopped cilantroandsliced green onions, for garnish (optional)
- 2tablespoonswhite vinegar
- 1tablespoonfish sauce
- 1/2teaspoonavocado oil
- 2teaspoonswhite sugar
- 1pinchground white pepper, or to taste
- 1mango- peeled, pitted, and diced
- 1Roma tomato, seeded and diced
- 1/4cupminced red onion
- 1/4cupminced jalapeno pepper, seeds and membranes removed
- 1/2cupchopped fresh cilantro
Instructions:
1. Gather the ingredients.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
2. Combine soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, and garlic in a large plastic bag with a zipper. Gently squeeze to mix well. Add chicken and coat with marinade. Squeeze out as much air from the bag as possible, coat all the chicken pieces with marinade, seal, and refrigerate for at least 20 minutes.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
3. Meanwhile, combine vinegar, fish sauce, avocado oil, sugar, and black pepper in a bowl for the salsa. Stir with a whisk or fork until sugar is dissolved. Add mango, tomato, red onion, jalapeño, and chopped cilantro to the bowl. Toss to combine, and refrigerate salsa until ready to serve.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
4. For tacos, remove chicken pieces from the marinade and reserve the marinade.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
5. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Carefully add the chicken thighs, and brown on each side, 1 to 2 minutes, then remove chicken to a plate.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
6. To the same skillet, add onion, and cook for about 1 minute. Stir in minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add reserved marinade, water, brown sugar, and black pepper, and bring to a boil.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
7. Return chicken to the skillet, smooth side down. Reduce heat to low, and simmer chicken uncovered, about 15 minutes. The liquid should bubble gently. Turn chicken and simmer 10 minutes more. Remove chicken from skillet to rest.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
8. Cook sauce over medium heat until syrupy, thick, and reduced, about 10 minutes. Remove skillet from heat. Remove bay leaves and discard.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
9. Slice chicken into 1/2-inch slices and return to the skillet to coat in the sauce. Garnish with fresh cilantro and chopped green onions, if desired.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka
10. Fill each tortilla with chicken strips and top with mango salsa. Serve immediately.Allrecipes / Renee Pajestka

========================================

Title: Pork and Apple Meatballs in Bao-Style Buns
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/pork-and-apple-meatballs-in-bao-style-buns-recipe-11796406
Ingredients:
- 1largeegg,lightly beaten
- 1/3cupfine drybreadcrumbs
- 2tablespoonsapplesauce
- 2green onions, chopped, plus more for garnish
- 1tablespoonless-sodiumsoy sauce
- 1/4teaspoonsalt
- 1/4teaspoongroundblack pepper
- 1poundground pork
- 1/2cupcoarsely shreddedapple
- 1/3cuphoisin sauce
- 1tablespoonsambal oelek
- 2teaspoonsrice vinegar
- pizza dough bao-style buns (recipe below)
- toasted sesame seeds, for garnish
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Stir together egg, breadcrumbs, applesauce, green onions, soy sauce, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Add ground pork and shredded apple. Mix until combined.
2. Shape into 16 (1 1/2 ounce) meatballs. Arrange in a foil-lined shallow baking pan.
3. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until an instant-read thermometer inserted into centers registers 160 degrees F (71 degrees C).
4. Whisk together hoisin, sambal oelek, and vinegar in a small bowl. Brush onto meatballs.
5. Serve meatballs in Pizza Dough Bao-Style Buns. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.Pizza Dough Bao-Style BunsDivide 1 pound purchased fresh pizza dough into 16 (1-ounce) balls. On a lightly floured surface, roll each ball into a 3-inch round. Brush tops with 2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil or coat with cooking spray. Fold in half. Place each bun on a small square of parchment paper. Cover and let rise until puffed, about 1 hour. Fill a 12-inch skillet with 1 inch of water. Bring water to a boil over medium-high heat. Place half of buns, on their parchment paper, 1 inch apart and away from edge of a steamer basket or bamboo steamer. Place steamer in skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Steam buns, covered, 10 minutes. Remove from heat, but do not lift lid (they can deflate). Let stand 5 minutes. Transfer buns to a wire rack to cool. Repeat with remaining buns.

Title: These 4-Ingredient Chicken Tenders Are Weeknight Dinner Gold
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/air-fryer-chicken-tenders-recipe-11714303
Ingredients:
- cooking spray
- 1largeegg
- 1/2cuppanko bread crumbs
- 2tablespoonscanola oil
- 8chicken tenders
- freshly chopped parsley for garnish
Instructions:
1. Gather ingredients.Allrecipes / France Cevallos
2. Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat basket with cooking spray.Allrecipes / France Cevallos
3. Whisk egg in a small bowl. In another bowl, stir together panko and oil until loose and crumbly.Allrecipes / France Cevallos
4. Dip each chicken tender into egg, allowing excess to drip off. Dip chicken in panko mixture to coat completely. Working in batches if needed.Allrecipes / France Cevallos
5. Arrange chicken in an even layer in the air fryer basket. Cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 12 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).Allrecipes / France Cevallos
6. Serve hot garnished with freshly chopped parsley. Enjoy!Allrecipes / France Cevallos

Title: Dirty Jartini Marinated Cheese
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/dirty-jartini-marinated-cheese-recipe-11753390
Ingredients:
- 4ouncesfeta, cubed
- 4ounceshavarti, cubed
- 4ouncesblue cheese,cubed
- ½cupblue cheese stuffed olivesreserve 3 tablespoons brine)
- 3/4cupolive oil
- 3tablespoonsolive brine
- 1tablespoonlemon zest
- 1teaspoonred pepper flakes
- 2ouncesgin
Instructions:
1. Combine feta, havarti, blue cheese, and olives in a large jar.
2. Add olive oil, brine, lemon zest, red pepper flakes, and gin into the jar and gently shake until everything is well combined.
3. Refrigerate until ready to serve.Peyton Beckwith

Title: Mediterranean Flatbread
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/mediterranean-flatbread-recipe-11730877
Ingredients:
- 2flatbreads, purchased or homemade
- 1/4cupextra-virgin olive oil
- 3garlic cloves,finely chopped
- 2cupshalvedcherry or grape tomatoes
- 1/2cupsliced Kalamata olives
- 1/2red onion,thinly sliced
- 1/3cupslicedpepperoncini
- 3tablespoonscrumbledfeta cheese, or more to taste
- choppedfresh oregano,for garnish (optional)
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine olive oil and garlic in a small bowl. Lightly brush a little garlic olive oil over the flatbreads.
3. Add tomatoes, olives, onion, and pepperoncini to a bowl; drizzle with remaining garlic olive oil, and gently combine.
4. Evenly top flatbreads with the tomato mixture, sprinkle with feta cheese, and place on a baking sheet.
5. Bake. in the preheated oven until flatbreads are starting to turn golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes. Sprinkle with chopped oregano and serve.

Title: Birthday Cake Dip
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/birthday-cake-dip-recipe-11803153
Ingredients:
- 1(8-ounce) packagecream cheese, softened
- 1(3.4-ounce) packagevanilla or cheesecake instant pudding mix
- 2/3cupmilk
- 1(8-ounce) tubfrozen whipped dessert topping, thawed
- 1/4cupmulticolored sprinkles(such as rainbow jimmies), divided
- animal crackers, graham crackers, strawberries or apple wedges for dipping
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Sammy Mila / Prop Styling: Kristen Schooley
2. Combine cream cheese, instant pudding mix and milk in a large bowl and beat with an electric mixer until smooth and thickened, about 1 minute.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Sammy Mila / Prop Styling: Kristen SchooleyFold in one-third of the whipped topping to lighten the mixture. Fold in remaining whipped topping.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Sammy Mila / Prop Styling: Kristen Schooley
3. Gently fold 1/4 cup sprinkles into the mixture. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Sammy Mila / Prop Styling: Kristen Schooley
4. Garnish with additional sprinkles. Serve with animal crackers, graham crackers, strawberries or apple wedges.Photographer: Jake Sternquist / Food Styling: Sammy Mila / Prop Styling: Kristen Schooley

Title: Red Curry Chicken Mini Pot Pies
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/red-curry-chicken-mini-pot-pies-recipe-11775513
Ingredients:
- 1(10.5 ounce) cancondensed cream of onion soup
- 1/2cupcannedunsweetened coconut milk
- 1tablespoonred curry paste, such as Mae Ploy®
- 1 1/2cupschoppedrotisserie chicken breast
- 3/4cupfrozen peas and carrots
- 1/4cupfinelychopped cilantro, plus more for garnish
- 1(14.1 ounce) packagepie dough( 2 crusts)
- 1largeegg
- 1tablespoonwater
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly coat 8 (2 1/2-inch) muffin cups with cooking spray.
2. Combine condensed soup, coconut milk, and curry paste in a saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring often, until curry paste is incorporated and sauce thickens slightly, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in chicken, frozen vegetables, and cilantro.
3. On a lightly floured surface, roll each pie crust into an 11-inch circle. Cut 8 (4 inch) circles and 8 (3 inch) circles from the crusts, rerolling scraps, if needed. Press 4-inch circles into bottoms and up sides of prepared muffin cups, stretching gently to reach tops of cups.
4. For egg wash, beat together egg and water in a small bowl.
5. Divide filling evenly among crust-lined cups, about 1/3 cup each. Brush edges of filled crusts with egg wash; top with 3-inch crust circles, gently pressing edges to seal. Crimp edges using fork tines as desired. Cut two 1/4-inch-long slits on top of each pie using a paring knife. Lightly brush tops with egg wash.
6. Bake in the preheated oven until pies are slightly puffed and browned on top, about 20 minutes. Cool in muffin cups 10 minutes. Loosen edges with a thin spatula, then carefully remove from muffin cups. Garnish with additional cilantro.

========================================

Title: Air Fryer Potato Slices with Dipping Sauce
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/air-fryer-potato-slices-with-dipping-sauce-recipe-11799563
Ingredients:
- 3/4cupketchup
- 1/2cupbeer
- 1tablespoonWorcestershire sauce
- 1/2teaspoononion powder
- 1/4teaspooncayenne, or to taste
- 2baking potatoesunpeeled
- olive oil cooking spray
- 1/2teaspoongarlic powder
- salt and freshly ground black pepperto taste
Instructions:
1. Combine ketchup, beer, Worcestershire sauce, onion powder, and cayenne in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, and simmer for 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool. Cover and store in the refrigerator until ready to use.
2. Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Spray the basket with cooking spray or line with a disposable parchment liner.
3. Slice potatoes 1/4-inch thick (use a mandoline if you have one), and place in a bowl. Spray potatoes with olive oil spray, and sprinkle with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Give the potatoes a good stir.
4. Place potatoes in a single layer in the air fryer, and cook, shaking occasionally, until they start to crisp up a bit and turn golden brown, 14 to 17 minutes. Cooking times can vary depending on the brand and size of the fryer, and you may have to cook in batches.
5. Remove from the fryer, and serve with beer ketchup dipping sauce.

Title: Brie and Apple Mini Tarts with Thyme Caramel
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/brie-and-apple-mini-tarts-with-thyme-caramel-recipe-11796403
Ingredients:
- 1tablespoonbutter
- 1/2cupchoppedonion
- 1cupchopped peeledapple
- 2teaspoonsbalsamic vinegar
- 1(1.9 ounce) packagebaked miniature phyllo tart shells(15 shells)
- 3ouncesBrie cheese, or as needed, rind removed
- 2tablespoonschopped walnuts
- 2tablespoonshigh-qualitycaramel sauce,such as Mrs. Richardson’s®
- 1teaspoonfresh thyme leaves
- flakysea salt, for garnish
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring often, until golden brown and tender, about 10 minutes. Add apple and cook, stirring occasionally, until just beginning to soften, about 4 minutes. Stir in vinegar and cook 30 seconds more.
3. Arrange tart shells on prepared baking sheet. Cut Brie into 15 small pieces and put one piece into each shell. Evenly fill with apple mixture. Sprinkle with walnuts.
4. Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and tart shells are golden, 12 to 15 minutes.
5. Meanwhile, stir together caramel sauce and thyme in a small bowl. Microwave until warmed, about 15 seconds. Drizzle tarts with caramel mixture and garnish with flaky salt.Sweet Caramel-Apple Mini TartsPreheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a 10x15-inch rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Melt 1 tablespoon  butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add 1 cup chopped apple and cook, stirring occasionally, until just beginning to soften, about 4 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon packed brown sugar and 1⁄2 teaspoon apple pie spice; cook 1 minute more. Arrange 15 baked miniature phyllo tart shells (1.9-ounce packages) on prepared baking sheet. Cut 2 ounces cream cheese into 15 cubes. Place 1 piece of cream cheese into each tart shell.  Evenly fill with apple mixture. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons chopped pecans. Bake until cream cheese is melted and shells are golden, 12 to 15 minutes. Drizzle tarts with 2 tablespoons warmed high-quality caramel sauce. Garnish with flaky salt.

Title: Easy Butternut Squash Ravioli
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/219174/easy-butternut-squash-ravioli/
Ingredients:
- 1cupmashed butternut squash
- ½teaspoonsalt
- ½teaspoonfreshly ground black pepper
- 1pinchcayenne pepper
- ½cupmascarpone cheese
- 1largeegg yolk
- ⅓cupgrated Parmesan cheese
- 1(16 ounce) packageround wonton wrappers
- 2tablespoonsbutter
- 1clovegarlic, unpeeled
- chopped fresh sage to taste
- 1tablespoongrated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
Instructions:
1. Gather all ingredients.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
2. Place mashed squash into a mixing bowl. Add salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Stir in mascarpone cheese, egg yolk, and 1/3 cup Parmesan cheese, mixing until filling is combined.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
3. Place a wonton wrapper onto a working surface. Wet the tip of a finger in water, and run it all along the outer edge of the wonton skin to moisten. Place about 1 teaspoon of filling in the center of the wonton.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
4. Fold the wonton in half to make a half-moon shape, and press the edges to seal. Repeat with the remaining wonton wrappers.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
5. Place a deep skillet over medium-low heat. Stir in butter and unpeeled clove of garlic.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
6. Meanwhile, bring a saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil. Drop filled ravioli into boiling water, a few at a time, and cook until they float to the top, about 2 minutes.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
7. Drain ravioli, and transfer to the skillet. Increase heat to medium-high, and cook just until ravioli are infused with garlic butter flavor, about 2 or 3 more minutes.Allrecipes / Qi Ai
8. Serve hot; sprinkle with chopped sage, more black pepper, and extra Parmesan cheese to taste.Allrecipes / Qi Ai

Title: These 4-Ingredient Cheesy Slices of Heaven Will Be the Hit of Your Next Party
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/cheesy-party-puffs-recipe-11812454
Ingredients:
- ⅓cupgrated Parmesan cheese
- ⅓cupmayonnaise
- ⅓onion, grated, juice reserved
- 1/2baguette, thinly sliced
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2. Combine Parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, onion, and reserved onion juice in a bowl; stir together until well blended. Spread the mixture thickly on baguette slices and set on a large baking sheet.
3. Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bread is lightly toasted, about 10 minutes.Cook’s NoteThe cheaper, pre-grated Parmesan cheese works better in this recipe.Take and Bake baguettes work especially well since they don't get too hard when baking.Peyton Beckwith

Title: Italian Salsa Verde Marinated Mozzarella
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/italian-salsa-verde-marinated-mozzarella-recipe-11751905
Ingredients:
- 3tablespoonscapers
- 2anchovy filets
- 1clovegarlicroughly chopped
- 1/4cupchoppedgreen onions
- 1/2cupflatparsley leaves
- 1/3cupmint leaves
- 1/2cupextra-virgin olive oil
- 1teaspoonlemon zest
- 1/4cupfresh lemon juice
- 1teaspooncrushed red pepper
- 2(8 ounce) containersmini mozzarella balls(ciliegine), drained
- 1(10 ounce) packagecherry tomatoes
- salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Instructions:
1. Add capers, anchovies, garlic, green onions, parsley, and mint to the bowl of a food processor and pulse until very finely chopped. Transfer mixture to a bowl.
2. Stir olive oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, mozzarella balls, and cherry tomatoes into herb mixture; season to taste with salt and pepper. Marinate, covered, in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.Peyton Beckwith

Title: Jalapeno Popper Twists
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/jalapeno-popper-twists-recipe-11736107
Ingredients:
- 1poundbacon
- 2sheetsfrozenpuff pastry, thawed according to package directions
- 1/2(8 ounce) packagecream cheese, softened
- 8ouncesCheddar cheese, shredded
- 2jalapenos -seeded, quartered, and sliced, or more to taste
- 1largeegg, beaten
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment.
2. Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels. Chop bacon when cool enough to handle.
3. Lightly flour a work surface, and roll out each pastry sheet until folds are smoothed out.
4. Place one pastry puff sheet on the prepared baking sheet. Spread cream cheese in a thin layer over pastry; sprinkle with 2/3 shredded Cheddar, half the bacon and half the jalapenos.
5. Place second sheet of pastry on top, aligning the edges. Using a sharp knife or pizza cutter, cut the assembled pastry in half lengthwise, then cut into 1.5-inch strips crosswise.
6. Brush pastry with beaten egg using a pastry brush. Twist each strip; touch up each twist with more egg wash as needed. Space twists out on the baking sheet; sprinkle with remaining Cheddar cheese, bacon, and jalapenos.
7. Bake in the preheated oven until puffed and golden brown, 12 to 15 minutes.Peyton Beckwith

Title: Seafood Boil Crackers
Category: snacks
URL: https://www.allrecipes.com/seafood-boil-crackers-recipe-11759741
Ingredients:
- 1cupcanola oil
- 2tablespoonsbutter, melted
- 1tablespoonpaprika
- 1teaspoongarlic powder
- 1teaspoononion powder
- 1teaspoonred pepper flakes
- 1tablespooncrab boil seasoning
- 1(11 ounce) boxminisaltines
Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C).
2. Whisk together oil, butter, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, red pepper flakes, and crab boil seasoning in a bowl.
3. Pour mixture into a 1-gallon resealable plastic bag and add saltines. Shake until saltines are completely coated. Evenly spread crackers onto a rimmed baking sheet.
4. Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, stirring once midway through. Allow crackers to cool before serving.Peyton Beckwith
